title: Hilarious & Clever Out-of-Office Messages for Work

steps.content: Hi, I’m currently out of the office. If you need immediate assistance, contact someone who isn’t me (preferably someone who knows what they’re doing). Best, Timothy

Hey! So, I’ve got good news and bad news. The good news is that I’m out of the office. The bad news is that I’m out of the office until Wednesday. If you can’t wait for a response, contact Ally at 555-555-555.
Roses are red, violets are blue, I’m out of the office with the flu. I’ll be back at my desk once I’m feeling better. In the meantime, please forward all assignments to Heather.
Hi, if you’re reading this, then it’s true. I’m on vacation, and you’re not. I know it’s hard to digest, but I’ll be back in the office Monday. Don’t be jealous. You’re doing a great job :)
I’m on annual leave until September 13th. I will allow each sender one email over this period. If you send me multiple emails, I will randomly delete them. Choose wisely. [1] X Research source

Hello! I’m on vacation until June 21st. If you need to reach me, all you have to do is: 1. Travel to Florida. 2. Take a drive to Disney World. 3. Shake hands with Mickey Mouse. 4. Turn back around and go home because I’m busy! In all seriousness, if you do need to contact me before June 21st, please reach out to Cindy. Until we meet again, Roger
I’m on vacation pretending to be a secret agent. Please leave a message, and I’ll respond as soon as I return from my top-secret mission.

Hello! I’m currently out of the office. Right now, I’m probably soaking up the sun on a secluded beach in Hawaii, drinking a piña colada. I’ll return to the office once my tan is perfect (or on February 16th, whichever comes first). Best, Katelyn

Thank you so much for your email. I love it already! It’s wrapped up like a sweet little present. I’m just going to place it under the tree for safekeeping until after the holidays. Is that alright with you? Perfect! In that case, I look forward to chatting on January 1st.

To whom it may concern, I am currently in a very important business meeting with Mr. Relaxation and Mrs. Novel. Our meeting and following conference will conclude on Monday morning. Until then, please forward any messages and urgent requests to Barbara at the front desk. Thank you, Emilia

steps.title: Stick with a witty one-liner to describe your OOO status.
steps.content: Stick with a witty one-liner to describe your OOO status. Don’t have a lot to say? Well, opt for a clever one-liner that explains you're out of the office without saying too much. Here are some funny and witty examples that can be used as is or expanded on: If found, contact someone other than me. The bad news is that I’m OOO. The good news is that I’m OOO. This is [your name]’s personal robot. For a more personal response, please contact [your immediate office contact]. I’m OOO. In case of an emergency, please hesitate before you call. I am currently out of the office and can be reached by waiting until I get back. I’m currently on a break to find myself. Good news: I’m in the last place I looked! I’m currently out of the office. My email is being renovated. OOO. If your message is urgent, try telepathy. I’m on break to re-evaluate my life choices. I’m not really here… Caught the office bug and am now quarantined at home 😷 [insert funny meme about being OOO] This inbox is full. Please wait 3 business days and try again. I’m unavailable. If it’s an emergency, dial 911. I’d prefer not to be reached at this time, please, and thank you. 🔙 0️⃣2️⃣.2️⃣2️⃣ Thankful for 4-day weekends. It’s Christmas…why are you emailing me? I’m on a top-secret mission to the North Pole. Retry contact on December 27th. Currently stuffing my face with turkey 🦃 If I don’t return December 27th, the elves found me.

steps.title: Keep it short and sweet for a professionally casual message.
steps.content: Keep it short and sweet for a professionally casual message. You don't have to get super creative or witty with your message—stick with something simple! These out-of-office messages get straight to the point without being too flashy: I’m currently out of the office. Thank you for your patience. I'll get back to you soon. I’m out of the office. I'll respond once I return. Thank you for the message. I'm not available right now, but I'll get back to you ASAP. Thanks for the message! I'll respond once I'm back at my desk. I’m currently not available. Please contact Josie with any urgent requests. Ben is currently out of the office. Forward emergencies to Brittany in HR. Thanks. I’m not in the office right now, but I'll give you a call once I am! I’m OOO. Please leave any messages and assignments with my assistant, Tony. Unfortunately, I'm not available right now. I will be back in the office on Friday. I’m OOO until next week. Please forward any urgent messages to Sophia at 888-888. Thank you!

steps.title: Allude to your vacation destination in your message.
steps.content: Allude to your vacation destination in your message. Let your colleagues know you’re in vacation mode with a clever and silly message describing where you’re living it up! Make a comment about the weather, activities you’ll be enjoying, and so forth. Check out these examples: I’ll call you back once I’ve defrosted. I’ll get back to you once I’ve returned to civilization. If you need me, I’ll be in my homeland of Florida. If you need me, prepare to climb the tallest mountain in the world. Currently chilling on a beach somewhere. Can you guess where I am? 🗽 Vacation mode activated 😎 My brain is on vacation and will return once my mental batteries are recharged. Currently channeling my inner beach bum. Can’t talk work. On vacation. Gone fishing. Busy upgrading my out-of-office tan. It’s the weekend, and I’m currently somewhere without WiFi. Currently recharging my batteries. I’ll get back to you after my 100th snack break. I’m busy watching Christmas movies. Chat with ya later!

steps.title: Keep your message family-friendly and lighthearted.
steps.content: Keep your message family-friendly and lighthearted. If you know your coworkers and boss have the same humor as you, go for a goofy or silly OOO message! Just make sure your message stays PG and is relatively lighthearted. This will help you remain professional while also being funny. Use emojis or emoticons (especially in Slack statuses) to amplify your joke and show that your message is supposed to make people smile. Avoid making fun of your job or colleagues in your message. Remember, an OOO message is a fun way to say, “I’m absent,” not to make a jab at anyone. You know your work atmosphere best, so only use a funny out-of-office message if you feel it’s appropriate. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Explain why and how long you’re away in your out-of-office message.
steps.content: Explain why and how long you’re away in your out-of-office message. The best OOO messages are short and to the point. They include a brief explanation of why you’re away, how long you’ll be gone, and who or how they can contact you in the meantime. [3] X Research source Here’s an example of an OOO email message: Hello, I’m currently out of the office until Monday—I’m defrosting in the Bahamas! Please contact Jeremy with any pressing issues. Best, Amy Make sure you have a colleague’s consent before putting them in your message if they’ll be taking care of any urgent business in your absence. You can also use this technique for Slack status updates. Make your status a clever remark, and schedule the status to go away when you return. [4] X Research source For example, your status might just say, Defrosting in the Bahamas 🏖️.

Setting up an automatic email response message for when you’re out of the office is a piece of cake! Simply follow these instructions, and you’ll be good to go: [5] X Research source Open your email and go to settings or preferences. Click on the section labeled “Vacation Responder,” “Automatic Replies,” or something similar. Enable the out-of-office feature, setting a date and time to start and end the automatic response. Compose your out-of-office message. Click “Save Changes.” How does automatic reply work? The message you compose and save will automatically be sent to anyone who emails you directly during the time you set.
